sentences.en: Agriculture is of vital importance to the nation's economy and the people's livelihood.
sentences.cn: 农业关系国计民生极大.

sentences.en: Appropriate arrangements will be made for their work and livelihood.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作和生活会得到妥善安排.

sentences.en: As a result of this conflict he lost both his home and his means of livelihood.
sentences.cn: 这场冲突使他同时失去了住所和生计来源。

sentences.en: Bates says he will lose his livelihood if his driving licence is taken away.
sentences.cn: 贝茨说，如果驾照被吊销，他就没有了谋生的手段。

sentences.en: Communities on the island depended on whaling for their livelihood.
sentences.cn: 岛上的居民靠捕鲸为生。

sentences.en: Consideration must be given to both the development of production and the improvement of the people's livelihood.
sentences.cn: 发展生产和改善人民生活二者必须兼顾.

sentences.en: Employment has a vital bearing on the people's livelihood.
It affords a livelihood to a great number of people.
sentences.cn: 这给许多人提供了生计.

sentences.en: It’s difficult to earn a livelihood as an artist.
Mowing lawns is his only livelihood.
sentences.cn: 他仅靠给人家草坪除草维持生计.

sentences.en: Predatory pricing by large supermarkets was threatening the livelihood of smaller businesses.
sentences.cn: 大型超市的掠夺性价格正威胁着小商店的生计。

sentences.en: She earns a livelihood by sewing.
She would have to earn her livelihood when she grew up.
sentences.cn: 她到成年就得自谋生路.

sentences.en: The newcomers directly threaten the livelihood of the established workers.
sentences.cn: 新来的工人直接威胁到老工人的饭碗。

sentences.en: They depended on animal husbandry for their livelihood.
They deprived a large number of the overseas Chinese of their means of livelihood and drove them out of their residences in dire poverty.
sentences.cn: 他们剥夺了大批华侨劳动人民的生活资料,然后将他们扫地出门.

sentences.en: We all have our various ways of gaining a livelihood.
sentences.cn: 我们全都各有各不相同的谋生之道.

words.tran_cn: 适于居住的；生活过得有价值的
活的；生动的；实况转播的；精力充沛的
活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的
活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的

trans.tran_cn: 生活，生计，谋生之道，营生
trans.tran_en: the way you earn money in order to live
